Anton Lesser( Henry Singleton ) . Vida SjÃ¸rslev( Ada ) . Niklas Maienschein( Wilhelm ) . JÃ³nas AlfreÃ° Birkisson( Einar ) . Joshua Seelenbinder( Eugen ) . Alexander Owen( Landon ) . Ben Ashenden( Darrel ) . Richard Hope( Dr. Reginald Murray ) . Heidi Toini( Bente ) . Alexandra Gottschlich( Sara Larsen ) . Kaja Chan( Mei Mei ) . CloÃ© Heinrich( Nina Larsen ) . Martin Greis-Rosenthal( Villads ) . Philipp Rafferty( Lead Man ) . Robert Cawsey( Porter ) . Scott Atkins( Stefan (uncredited) )

Status Finished (2022–2022)
